articles.description: May the best warrior win. That was the ethos as college students from different tai chi teams prepared to compete on a recent Saturday morning. They struck powerful poses while regulating their breathing.

articles.title: Fighting Spirit
articles.description: Alice is certainly not afraid of a fight.  Anything from using her fists, knives and any phaser.

articles.title: Dragon's Fighting Spirit
articles.description: Target 1 Dragon-Type monster you control that was Special Summoned this turn; for each monster your opponent currently controls that was Special Summoned this turn, it gains 1 additional attack during each Battle Phase this turn.

articles.author: Leigh Nordstrom
articles.title: Joe Coleâ€™s Fighting Spirit
articles.description: Joe Cole stars in the Cannes breakout "A Prayer Before Dawn," which tells the true story of English boxer Billy Moore, a man who was freed from incarceration in a Thai prison through fighting in Muay Thai tournaments.

articles.description: No matter how tough you may be, you will always have a weak spot. In Korrina's case, her weak spots were encased in her skates and as a good trainer should, Ash learns to exploit these weaknesses Welp, here we are once again with a blast to the past. It's beeâ€¦
